menu_items.name: Shrimps and Rice
menu_items.description: shrimps and rice, fried green plantains, salad, plaintain chips and pop corn.

menu_items.name: Garlic Shrimp
menu_items.description: garlic shrimp with a special touch of the house, plaintain chips and pop corn.

menu_items.name: Breaded Shrimps
menu_items.description: crispy breaded shrimps, rice with Golf sauce, fried green plantains, salad, plaintain chips and pop corn.

menu_items.name: Special Mixed Rice
menu_items.description: Rice with shrimps, fish, squids, shells, fried green plantains or fried ramp banana, plaintain chips and pop corn.

menu_items.name: Fried Fish Fillet
menu_items.description: fish fillet with rice, lentil stew, fried green plantains, salad, plaintain chips and pop corn.

menu_items.name: Seafood Rice
menu_items.description: Rice with shrimps, fish, squids, shells, clams, mussels and crab, fried green plantains or fried ramp banana, plaintain chips and pop corn.

menu_items.name: Jumbo Whole Fish
menu_items.description: jumbo shole fish (2 pounds) with rice, lentil stew and fried green plantains.
